issue.title: Add Latest news in the administration panel
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

It could be interesting to add latest news in the EasySDI administrator panel : 

News :
http://www.easysdi.org/index.php/fr/news/easysdi-communication-news?format=feed&type=rss

Technical news :
http://forge.easysdi.org/news?format=atom&key=oWNV8uUXTYWOfDFelCI6UGknsbktJKYGd5l0odeu

comments.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

do we reallay need this ?
